00023 /**

00027  * 
00028  * @brief Class for reading and writing snp clustering models (eg
00029  * gaussian elipses of mean and variance). Uses sqlite as a background
00030  * to provide convenient fast random access to large numbers of snps
00031  * (e.g. Millions) with minimal memory impact.
00032  * 
00033  */

00042 /**
00043  * @brief Class for reading and writing snp clustering models (eg
00044  * gaussian elipses of mean and variance). Uses sqlite as a background
00045  * to provide convenient fast random access to large numbers of snps
00046  * (e.g. Millions) with minimal memory impact.
00047  */
